com.github.moribund.images

Class SpriteDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.moribund.images.SpriteDrawer

  • public class SpriteDrawer
extends java.lang.Object
    The SpriteDrawer class displays Sprites. It is set up at the start of the program and populates a HashMap to have readily available Sprite that can then be displayed directly from this class. The use of Dagger 2's Injection allows much more easy to simply using this SpriteDrawer as opposed to having to make one's own SpriteBatch field.

    • Field Detail

      • spriteForFile

        private final it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2ObjectOpenHashMap<SpriteFile,com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite> spriteForFile
        A Object2ObjectOpenHashMap that contains all the Sprite in relation to their SpriteFile. The reason to prefer a Object2ObjectOpenHashMap over a HashMap can be found in MusicPlayer.musicForFile's documentation.

      • spriteBatch

        @Inject
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch spriteBatch
        The SpriteBatch that is Injected by Dagger 2.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteDrawer

        public SpriteDrawer()
        The constructor for the SpriteDrawer. This injects the SpriteComponent, initializes spriteForFile, then populates it by calling setup().

    • Method Detail

      • injectSpriteComponenet

        private void injectSpriteComponenet()
        Injects the SpriteDrawer to provide a spriteBatch.

      • setup

        private void setup()
        Populates the spriteForFile, using makeSprite(SpriteFile) to make Sprites.

      • makeSprite

        private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite makeSprite(SpriteFile file)
        Makes a Sprite instance by the SpriteFile value using its SpriteFile.location field and LibGDX's Texture.
        Parameters:
        file - The SpriteFile enum value.
        Returns:
        The Sprite made.

      • drawSprite

        public void drawSprite(SpriteFile spriteFile,
                       Coordinate coordinate)
        Draws a Sprite by fetching it from the spriteForFile HashMap and drawing it to the given Coordinate.
        Parameters:
        spriteFile - The SpriteFile enum value to draw.
        coordinate - The Coordinate on the game's grid.

      • getSprite

        private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite getSprite(SpriteFile file)
        Gets the sprite for a given SpriteFile stored in the spriteForFile.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The Sprite fetched.
